sql_query.sql: SELECT "order_order"."id", "order_order"."number", "order_order"."site_id", "order_order"."basket_id", "order_order"."user_id", "order_order"."billing_address_id", "order_order"."currency", "order_order"."total_incl_tax", "order_order"."total_excl_tax", "order_order"."shipping_incl_tax", "order_order"."shipping_excl_tax", "order_order"."shipping_tax_code", "order_order"."shipping_address_id", "order_order"."shipping_method", "order_order"."shipping_code", "order_order"."status", "order_order"."guest_email", "order_order"."date_placed", "myauth_user"."id", "myauth_user"."password", "myauth_user"."last_login", "myauth_user"."is_superuser", "myauth_user"."email", "myauth_user"."first_name", "myauth_user"."last_name", "myauth_user"."is_staff", "myauth_user"."is_active", "myauth_user"."date_joined", "myauth_user"."username", "myauth_user"."extra_field", "order_billingaddress"."id", "order_billingaddress"."title", "order_billingaddress"."first_name", "order_billingaddress"."last_name", "order_billingaddress"."line1", "order_billingaddress"."line2", "order_billingaddress"."line3", "order_billingaddress"."line4", "order_billingaddress"."state", "order_billingaddress"."postcode", "order_billingaddress"."country_id", "order_billingaddress"."search_text", "address_country"."iso_3166_1_a2", "address_country"."iso_3166_1_a3", "address_country"."iso_3166_1_numeric", "address_country"."printable_name", "address_country"."name", "address_country"."display_order", "address_country"."is_shipping_country", "order_shippingaddress"."id", "order_shippingaddress"."title", "order_shippingaddress"."first_name", "order_shippingaddress"."last_name", "order_shippingaddress"."line1", "order_shippingaddress"."line2", "order_shippingaddress"."line3", "order_shippingaddress"."line4", "order_shippingaddress"."state", "order_shippingaddress"."postcode", "order_shippingaddress"."country_id", "order_shippingaddress"."search_text", "order_shippingaddress"."phone_number", "order_shippingaddress"."notes", T6."iso_3166_1_a2", T6."iso_3166_1_a3", T6."iso_3166_1_numeric", T6."printable_name", T6."name", T6."display_order", T6."is_shipping_country" FROM "order_order" LEFT OUTER JOIN "myauth_user" ON ("order_order"."user_id" = "myauth_user"."id") LEFT OUTER JOIN "order_billingaddress" ON ("order_order"."billing_address_id" = "order_billingaddress"."id") LEFT OUTER JOIN "address_country" ON ("order_billingaddress"."country_id" = "address_country"."iso_3166_1_a2") LEFT OUTER JOIN "order_shippingaddress" ON ("order_order"."shipping_address_id" = "order_shippingaddress"."id") LEFT OUTER JOIN "address_country" T6 ON ("order_shippingaddress"."country_id" = T6."iso_3166_1_a2") WHERE "order_order"."number" = '100221' LIMIT 21

SELECT "order_line"."id", "order_line"."order_id", "order_line"."partner_id", "order_line"."partner_name", "order_line"."partner_sku", "order_line"."partner_line_reference", "order_line"."partner_line_notes", "order_line"."stockrecord_id", "order_line"."product_id", "order_line"."title", "order_line"."upc", "order_line"."quantity", "order_line"."line_price_incl_tax", "order_line"."line_price_excl_tax", "order_line"."line_price_before_discounts_incl_tax", "order_line"."line_price_before_discounts_excl_tax", "order_line"."unit_price_incl_tax", "order_line"."unit_price_excl_tax", "order_line"."tax_code", "order_line"."status" FROM "order_line" WHERE "order_line"."order_id" IN (66) ORDER BY "order_line"."id" ASC

SELECT "order_orderstatuschange"."id", "order_orderstatuschange"."order_id", "order_orderstatuschange"."old_status", "order_orderstatuschange"."new_status", "order_orderstatuschange"."date_created" FROM "order_orderstatuschange" WHERE "order_orderstatuschange"."order_id" IN (66) ORDER BY "order_orderstatuschange"."date_created" DESC

UPDATE "order_order" SET "number" = '100221', "site_id" = 1, "basket_id" = 221, "user_id" = NULL, "billing_address_id" = NULL, "currency" = 'GBP', "total_incl_tax" = 32.00, "total_excl_tax" = 30.00, "shipping_incl_tax" = 0.00, "shipping_excl_tax" = 0.00, "shipping_tax_code" = NULL, "shipping_address_id" = NULL, "shipping_method" = 'Free shipping', "shipping_code" = 'free-shipping', "status" = 'B', "guest_email" = '', "date_placed" = '2024-07-22T17:27:27.043036+00:00'::timestamptz WHERE "order_order"."id" = 66

INSERT INTO "order_ordernote" ("order_id", "user_id", "note_type", "message", "date_created", "date_updated") VALUES (66, 318, 'System', 'Order status changed from ''A'' to ''B''', '2024-07-22T17:27:27.128144+00:00'::timestamptz, '2024-07-22T17:27:27.128148+00:00'::timestamptz) RETURNING "order_ordernote"."id"
